meanings.definition: A Filipino dish made by marinating meat in vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, and spices before cooking.
meanings.sent1: My mom cooked delicious adobos for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's specialty is their flavorful adobos.
meanings.sent3: The adobos were so tasty that they danced in my mouth.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the simmering adobos filled the entire house.
meanings.sent5: I can never forget the first time I tried adobos; it was a flavor explosion.

meanings.definition: A seasoning or marinade made with vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, and spices.
meanings.sent1: The chef's secret adobos added a unique taste to the dish.
meanings.sent2: I always keep a bottle of homemade adobos in my kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The adobos gave the bland chicken a flavorful makeover.
meanings.sent4: The adobos transformed the plain vegetables into a culinary delight.
meanings.sent5: The rich aroma of the adobos filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
